name: Maggie and The Evil Moles
description:
Entry for the Weekly Game Jam 167 (Theme: Glide).

Maggie is a gliding squirrel. She's been having a happy life for as long as she can remember. Recently, an army of evil moles have been destroying the forest she lives in. They have recruited a bunch of bees that were bored and looking for having some fun. Help Maggie restore peace in her beloved forest.
